reference.shortdesc: The howtoavoid element contains information about how a user can avoid a hazard, for example, "Do not use solvents to clean the drum surface."

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The howtoavoid element is specialized from div. It is defined in the hazard-statement domain module.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following code sample illustrates a hazard statement with the signal word of "notice", which is reserved for situations that only involve possible property damage. The howtoavoid element provides instructions about how to avoid possible damage.
example.codeblock:
Machinery Damage
  • Do NOT use solvents to clean the drum surface
  • Read manual for proper drum cleaning procedure
